modeSwitcher.lighty.title: Lighty Mode Switcher
modeSwitcher.lighty.number_mode.tooltip: The upper value is the BlockLightLevel, the lower value is the SkyLightLevel
modeSwitcher.lighty.boring_cross_mode.to: It feels like every Light Overlay Mod has them
modeSwitcher.lighty.farmland_mode.toolti: Similar to Carpet Mode but exclusively for farmland blocks
modeSwitcher.lighty.settings.tooltip: Customize Lighty to fit your needs!
settings.lighty.title: Lighty Settings
lighty.selected.tooltip: The currently selected overlay. Click to get to a menu to change it.
lighty.overlay.tooltip: Whether the overlay is on or not. Click to toggle. To quickly toggle, press %s.
lighty.overlay.title: Choose an Overlay
lighty.options.block_threshold.tooltip: If the block light level is less than or equal to %d, the overlay is red or orange, depending on the sky light level. Otherwise, it is green.
lighty.options.farm_growth_threshold.too: With a light level above %d, crops will grow and the overlay is green. Below, crops won't grow and the overlay is orange. Defaults to 8.
lighty.options.farm_uproot_threshold.too: With a light level below %d, crops can't be planted and the overlay is red. Defaults to 8.
lighty.options.sky_threshold.tooltip: If the block light level is below the value specified in 'Block Threshold' and the sky light level is less than or equal to %d, the overlay is red. Otherwise, it is orange.
lighty.options.overlay_distance.tooltip: The radius of the area covered by the light overlay, in chunks. Defaults to 2. High overlay distance may impact performance severally.
lighty.options.overlay_brightness.toolti: The brightness of the rendered overlay. Defaults to 10. Especially useful when using shaders.
lighty.options.show_safe.tooltip: If on, the overlay gets rendered on safe (green) spots.
lighty.options.show_skylight_level.toolt: If on, Number Mode shows both block-light and sky-light levels. (Default: ON)
lighty.options.auto_on.tooltip: If on, the overlay gets enabled when holding an item of certain type. (Default: OFF, Default items: minecraft:torch, minecraft:soul_torch, minecraft:lantern, minecraft:soul_lantern)
